identity: Believed fictional by general Earth populace
knownrelatives: Buri (Tiwaz, great-grandfather); Bor (grandfather, deceased); Bestla (grandmother, deceased); Odin (father, deseaced); Frigga (mother); Balder, Hermod (brothers); Thor, Vidar (half-brothers); Loki (step-brother); Ve, Vili (uncles, deceased); Hoder (cousin); Mimir (granduncle)
powers: As well as possessing the superhuman abilities shared by all the Gods of Asgard, Tyr can lift 35 tons which is more than the average Asgardian male
